name: Excelsior Legal Collaborative
description: Excelsior Legal Collaborative is a collaboration between Legal Assistance to the Elderly, Asian Law Caucus, Jubilee Immigration Advocates, and Excelsior Works! to serve residents of San Francisco’s Supervisor District 11. This program provides wide-ranging legal services in the areas of Housing, Immigration, Employment Law, and Senior Legal Services. For those who live in or near San Francisco’s District 11.
